title: Salesman
description: Developed a Salesman app enabling sales professionals to efficiently manage leads, track orders, and run campaigns, streamlining their sales activities.

title: ERP App
description: Implemented a customized ERP system to integrate finance, inventory, and HR, enhancing real-time data visibility, reducing manual processes, and improving decision-making efficiency.

title: Work App
description: Developed Work App, an intuitive HR platform integrating communication, attendance, and leave management, streamlining tasks and boosting efficiency, available on the Play Store.
